description: This is the [Cloud Firestore](https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/) component of the [Firebase JS SDK](https://www.npmjs.com/package/firebase).

name: @firebase/firestore

scripts.prebuild: tsc -d --downlevelIteration --declarationDir dist/lib --emitDeclarationOnly && tsc -m es2015 --moduleResolution node scripts/*.ts
scripts.test:node: FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_PORT=8080 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_PROJECT_ID=test-emulator TS_NODE_CACHE=NO TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' nyc --reporter lcovonly -- mocha 'test/{,!(browser)/**/}*.test.ts' --file index.node.ts --opts ../../config/mocha.node.opts
scripts.test:node:persistence: FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_PORT=8080 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_PROJECT_ID=test-emulator USE_MOCK_PERSISTENCE=YES TS_NODE_CACHE=NO TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' nyc --reporter lcovonly -- mocha 'test/{,!(browser)/**/}*.test.ts' --require ts-node/register --require index.node.ts --require test/util/node_persistence.ts --opts ../../config/mocha.node.opts
scripts.test:node:persistence:prod: USE_MOCK_PERSISTENCE=YES TS_NODE_CACHE=NO TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module":"commonjs"}' nyc --reporter lcovonly -- mocha 'test/{,!(browser)/**/}*.test.ts' --require ts-node/register --require index.node.ts --require test/util/node_persistence.ts --opts ../../config/mocha.node.opts
